Name: Knights College
About the game: Update 2021/08/08 ・Simplified Chinese and Spanish have been added. Update Roadmap ・The following languages will be supported as soon as the translation is completed. 　Thai / Vietnamese / Portuguese / Korean Announcement ・Gameplay streaming of Knights College is allowed up to chapter 3. 　And, it is prohibited to stream after chapter 4. ・This is a story-driven visual novel. Please be careful not to spoil your review or impression. ・This game runs on Windows 10 (64bit). Story One day, Argo, a young man living a leisurely life in a fishing village in the countryside, receives a letter of recommendation from the Knights College of his dreams. Not knowing why he was recommended, he enrolls and spends his days with his fellow knight candidates. Card In KnightsCollege, all conversations and movements are done through card-based selection. Each time you get a new card, it unlocks a conversation, opens up a different route, or increases your likability with the character. Life at the Knights College Lectures : Argo will learn many things from the instructor. Training : Argo trains swords and guns. Bath : At the end of the day, you can take a bath with your favorite character. Events : Various events are waiting for the knight cadets, such as room exchange and out-of-college activities.
